changeSet.comment: Drop foreign key constraint in AdverseEventType_AUD table

changeSet.author: timler
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE AdverseEventType ADD id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER id;

ALTER TABLE AdverseEventType_AUD ADD id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER id;

ALTER TABLE AdverseEvent_AUD ADD type_id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(type_id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(type_id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(type_id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(type_id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(type_id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER type_id;

ALTER TABLE AdverseEvent ADD type_id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(type_id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(type_id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(type_id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(type_id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(type_id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER type_id;
UPDATE AdverseEventType_AUD AS updateTable LEFT JOIN AdverseEventType AS joinTable ON (updateTable.id_temp = joinTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.id = joinTable.id WHERE joinTable.id IS NOT null;
DELETE AdverseEventType_AUD FROM AdverseEventType_AUD LEFT JOIN AdverseEventType AS joinTable ON (AdverseEventType_AUD.id = joinTable.id) WHERE joinTable.id IS null

UPDATE AdverseEvent AS updateTable LEFT JOIN AdverseEventType AS joinedTable ON (updateTable.type_id_temp = joinedTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.type_id = joinedTable.id WHERE joinedTable.id IS NOT null;

UPDATE AdverseEvent_AUD AS updateTable LEFT JOIN AdverseEventType AS joinedTable ON (updateTable.type_id_temp = joinedTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.type_id = joinedTable.id WHERE joinedTable.id IS NOT null;
